sect1.title: OpenLink BPEL Process Manager Outgoing message
sect1.para: This page shows information about the Outgoing message.

simplelist.member: To view Instance value for the Outgoing message check value on the given list.
To view Partner name for the Outgoing message check value on the given list.
To view Endpoint location for the Outgoing message check value on the given list.
To view Node ID value for the Outgoing message check value on the given list.
To view the SOAP Envelope message format for the Outgoing message, check the xml that is presented on the white area under the list of values for the Outgoing message.
To proceed further click "Proceed with invoke with parner". This will go to the Debug message queue page.
To ignore further proceeding click "Ignore". This will go to the Debug message queue page.
To return back to Debug message queue page click "Back".
